mapper.insert: insert into product_review(ph_num, review_content, review_img, satis_size, satis_color, satis_thinkness, ani_neck_length, ani_chest_length, ani_back_length, ani_weight, review_score) values(#{ph_num}, #{review_content}, #{review_img}, #{satis_size}, #{satis_color}, #{satis_thinkness}, #{ani_neck_length}, #{ani_chest_length}, #{ani_back_length}, #{ani_weight}, #{review_score})
mapper.select: select avg(review_score) from product_review where pd_num = #{pd_num}
select count(review_num) from product_review where pd_num = #{pd_num}
mapper.delete: delete from product_review where pd_num = #{pd_num} and mem_num = #{mem_num}
mapper.select: select * from purchase_history as ph, product as pd, product_stock as ps where ph.mem_num = #{mem_num} and ph.pd_num = pd.pd_num and ph.stk_num = ps.stk_num and ph.review_done = 0
